details.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
details.author: Joe Sabah

details.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
details.author: David Lloyd George

details.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.
details.author: Aristotle

details.quote: The superior man acts before he speaks, and afterwards speaks according to his action.
details.author: Confucius

details.quote: You cannot score a goal when you are sitting on the bench. To do so, you have to dress up and enter the game.
details.author: Israelmore Ayivor

details.quote: We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly.
details.author: Aristotle

details.quote: God provides the wind, but man must raise the sails.
details.author: St. Augustine

details.quote: The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do.
details.author: Thomas Alva Edison

details.quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been'
details.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

details.quote: If you don't make things happen then things will happen to you.
If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
details.author: Mario Andretti

details.quote: Action is the last resource of those who know not how to dream.
details.author: Oscar Wilde

details.quote: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
details.author: Lewis Cass

details.quote: Action may not always bring happiness ... but there is no happiness without action.
details.author: Benjamin Disraeli

details.quote: Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.
details.author: Napolean Bonaparte

details.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
details.author: Dale Carnegie

details.quote: Action hangs, as it were, dissolved in speech, in thoughts whereof speech is the shadow; and precipitates itself therefrom. The kind of speech in a man betokens the kind of action you will get from him.
details.author: Thomas Carlyle

details.quote: Everywhere in life, the true question is not what we gain, but what we do.
details.author: Thomas Carlyle

details.quote: As I grow older, I pay less attention to what people say. I just watch what they do.
details.author: Andrew Carnegie

details.quote: The world cares very little about what a man or woman knows; it is what a man or woman is able to do that counts.
details.author: Booker T. Washington

details.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
details.author: Peter Marshall

details.quote: Whatever you do may seem insignificant to you, but it is most important that you do it.
details.author: Mahatma Gandhi

details.quote: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
details.author: Thomas Huxley

details.quote: Be content to act, and leave the talking to others.
details.author: Baltasar Gracian

details.quote: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
details.author: Harold Nicolson

details.quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
details.author: Warren Buffett

details.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
details.author: Nolan Bushnell

details.quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
details.author: Jack Canfield

details.quote: All problems become smaller if you don't dodge them but confront them.
details.author: William F. Halsey

details.quote: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
details.author: Red Auerbach

details.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
details.author: Maya Angelou

details.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
details.author: Will Rogers

details.quote: If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts; but if he will be content to begin with doubts, he shall end in certainties.
details.author: Francis Bacon

details.quote: Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.
details.author: Paulo Coelho

details.quote: A mathematical formula for happiness:Reality divided by Expectations.There were two ways to be happy:improve your reality or lower your expectations.
details.author: Jodi Picoult

details.quote: Don’t follow any advice, no matter how good, until you feel as deeply in your spirit as you think in your mind that the counsel is wise.
details.author: Joan Rivers

details.quote: One’s first step in wisdom is to questions everything – and one’s last is to come to terms with everything.
details.author: Gerog C. Lichtenberg

details.quote: Do not complain beneath the stars about the lack of bright spots in your life.
details.author: Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson

details.quote: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
details.author: Baltasar Gracian

details.quote: Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own.
details.author: Bruce Lee

details.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
details.author: Abraham Lincoln

details.quote: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you're not passionate enough from the start, you'll never stick it out.
details.author: Steve Jobs

details.quote: Always speak politely to an enraged dragon.
details.author: Steven Brust

details.quote: Be silent and safe — silence never betrays you; Be true to your word and your work and your friend; Put least trust in him who is foremost to praise you, Nor judge of a road till it draw to the end.
details.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

details.quote: Some people like my advice so much that they frame it upon the wall instead of using it.
details.author: Gordon R. Dickson

details.quote: Don't try to solve serious matters in the middle of the night.
details.author: Philip K. Dick

details.quote: Go wisely and slowly. Those who rush stumble and fall.
details.author: Britney Spears

details.quote: I don't think anyone can give you advice when you've got a broken heart.
details.author: William Shakespeare

details.quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
details.author: Fran Lebowitz

details.quote: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.
details.author: Thomas S. Monson

details.quote: The most important thing to do if you find yourself in a hole is to stop digging.
details.author: Warren Buffett

details.quote: Love unconditionally, laugh intentionally, live strategically, and learn daily.
details.author: Hope D. Blackwell

details.quote: Seek to be the smartest in a room, not the loudest.
details.author: Matshona Dhilwayo

details.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
details.author: Benjamin Franklin

details.quote: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
Avoid a cure that is worse than the disease.
details.author: Aesop

details.quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
details.author: William Shakespeare

details.quote: Focus on what's right in your world instead of what's wrong.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
details.author: Oprah Winfrey

details.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
details.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

details.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
details.author: Truman Capote

details.quote: Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it’s all an experience.
details.author: Roy T. Bennett

details.quote: I do not think, sir, you have any right to command me, merely because you are older than I, or because you have seen more of the world than I have; your claim to superiority depends on the use you have made of your time and experience.
details.author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

details.quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the Creator for all I have not seen.
details.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

details.quote: No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens.
details.author: Veronica Roth, Insurgent

details.quote: All knowledge hurts.
details.author: Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

details.quote: People never learn anything by being told, they have to find out for themselves.
details.author: Paulo Coelho, Veronika Decides to Die

details.quote: Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.
details.author: Paulo Coelho

details.quote: Experience is what you get when you didn't get what you wanted. And experience is often the most valuable thing you have to offer.
details.author: Randy Pausch

details.quote: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at the moment.
details.author: Eckhart Tolle

details.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
details.author: Rita Mae Brown, Alma Mater

details.quote: Nothing ever becomes real 'til it is experienced.
details.author: John Keats

details.quote: Experience is not what happens to a man; it is what a man does with what happens to him.
details.author: Aldous Huxley

details.quote: Some things cannot be taught; they must be experienced. You never learn the most valuable lessons in life until you go through your own journey.
details.author: Roy T. Bennett

details.quote: Science, my lad, is made up of mistakes, but they are mistakes which it is useful to make, because they lead little by little to the truth.
details.author: Jules Verne

details.quote: In order to rise from its own ashes, a Phoenix first must burn.
details.author: Octavia Butler

details.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
details.author: Victoria Holt

details.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
details.author: Henry Ford

details.quote: A new experience can be extremely pleasurable, or extremely irritating, or somewhere in between, and you never know until you try it out.
details.author: Lemony Snicket

details.quote: Time is not the great teacher. Experience is. A man may live a whole life, but if he never leaves his home to experience that life, he dies knowing nothing. A mere child who has suffered and lived can be the wiser of the two.
details.author: Lynsay Sands

details.quote: If you didn't grow up like I did then you don't know, and if you don't know it's probably better you don't judge.
details.author: Junot Díaz

details.quote: There are three kinds of men. The ones that learn by readin’. The few who learn by observation. The rest of them have to pee on the electric fence for themselves.
details.author: Will Rogers

details.quote: Experience had taught me that even the most precious memories fade with the passage of time.
details.author: Nicholas Sparks

details.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
details.author: Albert Einstein

details.quote: Strength comes from confidence and courage not to give up.
A winner is someone who gets up one more time than he is knocked down.
Instead of giving yourself reasons why you cant, give yourself reasons why you can.
Don’t let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway; we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
details.author: Earl Nightingale

details.quote: If plan A didnt worked. The alphabet has 25 more letters, stay cool.
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
details.author: Samuel Beckett

details.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
details.author: Vince Lombardi

details.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
details.author: Confucius

details.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
details.author: Harriet Stowe

details.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
details.author: Thomas Edison

details.quote: I am not discouraged because every wrong attempt discarded is a step forward.
details.author: Thomas Edison

details.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
details.author: George Eliot

details.quote: To be a champ, you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.
details.author: Sugar Ray Robinson

details.quote: There will be times in life when you cannot succeed. Or times when hardship seems about to crush you. Such times are inevitable, yet we should not allow our spirits to be broken by them.
Being confident is what keeps you going, never lose faith.
Strength comes from confidence and courage not to give up.
Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
details.author: Jane Addams

details.quote: If you like the rainbow, you have to learn to endure storm.
No one has the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.
details.author: Maeve Greyson

details.quote: Don’t give up. There are too many nay-sayers out there who will try to discourage you. Don’t listen to them. The only one who can make you give up is yourself.
details.author: Sidney Sheldon

details.quote: Be an inspiration to others by refusing to give up. Who knows what someone else can achieve because you never gave up and in turn inspired them not to give up.
The pain when you fail is not to convince you to stop, but to be overcome so you can find success there and move on.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
details.author: Albert Einstein

details.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
details.author: Steve Maraboli

details.quote: You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, or even months over-analyzing a situation; trying to put the pieces together, justifying what could’ve, would’ve happened… or you can just leave the pieces of the floor and move on.”
details.author: Tupac Shakur

details.quote: A very wise man once told me that you can’t look back – you just have to put the past behind you, and find something better in your future.
details.author: Jodi Picoult

details.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things because we’re curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
details.author: Walt Disney

details.quote: Being happy does not mean at all that things are perfect. It clearly means you have decided to peep into and look beyond imperfections.
When you feel defeaed, just push forward and keep going, prove to yourself that you'll never stay down.
Keep you head and heart going in the right direction, and you won't have to worry about your feet.
If you’re not moving forward, you’re falling back.
details.author: Sam Waterson

details.quote: Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energy moving forward together towards an answer.
details.author: Denis Waitley

details.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
details.author: Alyson Noel

details.quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
details.author: Martin Luther King Jr

details.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
details.author: Alexander Graham Bell

details.quote: The answer to every adversity lies in courageously moving forward with faith.
details.author: Edmond Mbiaka

details.quote: Even a rock moves on.
details.author: Anthony Liccione

details.quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
details.author: Kahlil Gibran

details.quote: Rejection gives you more power to push forward.
You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
details.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

details.quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
details.author: Conrad Hall

details.quote: Life moves on and so should we.
details.author: Spencer Johnson

details.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
details.author: Jim Rohn

details.quote: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
details.author: Wayne Dyer

details.quote: Take charge of your attitude. Don't let someone else choose it for you.
When you have good attitude, your biggest power will come once people underestimate you.
If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
details.author: Maya Angelou

details.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
details.author: Milton Berle

details.quote: Once you have decided to move, never ponder over decision because indecisive attitude hurts your confidence.
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
details.author: Oscar Wilde

details.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
details.author: Benjamin Disraeli

details.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
details.author: Albert Einstein

details.quote: There is no smooth sailing in life. If you enjoy success, make it an aspiration, if you encounter obstacles get up and strive to regain confidence but never give up.
Keeping a positive attitude will help you feel good and effective way to arm you with confidence.
Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.
details.author: Neil Gaiman

details.quote: Smile increases value of face..Anger spoils the beauty of soul..Faith is the force of life... but Confidence is the companion of success!
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
details.author: Lucille Ball

details.quote: You may only be someone in the world, but to someone else, you may be the world...
Love yourself. Be gentle, kind, respectful, sincere. If you carry that out, you might inspire others with that attitude.
A good way to change someones attitude is to change your own. Because, the same sun that melts butter, also hardens caly! Life is as we think, so think beautifully.
A ship is always safe at shore, but that’s not what it’s built for.
details.author: Albert Einstein

details.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
details.author: Michael Jordan

details.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
details.author: Ayn Rand

details.quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want.
details.author: Oprah Winfrey

details.quote: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
details.author: Marilyn Monroe

details.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
details.author: Malala Yousafzai

details.quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
details.author: Nora Ephron

details.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
details.author: Steve Jobs

details.quote: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it’s OK. But you’ve got to shoot for something. A lot of people don’t even shoot.
details.author: Confucius

details.quote: Don't compare your struggles to anyone else's. Don't get discouraged by the success of others. Make your own path and never give up.
details.author: MJ Korvan

details.quote: The struggle of life is one of our greatest blessings. It makes us patient, sensitive, and Godlike. It teaches us that although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
details.author: Helen Keller

details.quote: We grow because we struggle, we learn and overcome.
details.author: R. C. Allen

details.quote: The struggle alone pleases us, not the victory.
details.author: Blaise Pascal

details.quote: If there is no Struggle, there is no progress.
details.author: Frederick Douglass

details.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
details.author: Oprah Winfrey

details.quote: Whatever the struggle, continue the climb. It may be only one step to the summit.
details.author: Diane Westlake

details.quote: Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times, they can only make you stronger.
The struggle of my life created empathy - I could relate to pain, being abandoned, having people not love me.
details.author: Oprah Winfrey

details.quote: The important thing in life is not the triumph but the struggle.
details.author: Pierre de Coubertin

details.quote: Struggle is strengthening. Battling with evil gives us the power to battle evil even more.
details.author: Ossie Davis

details.quote: I'm thankful for my struggle because without it I wouldn't have stumbled across my strength.
details.author: Alex Elle

details.quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
details.author: Pope Paul VI

details.quote: Once all struggle is grasped, miracles are possible.
details.author: Mao Zedong

details.quote: Believe me, the reward is not so great without the struggle.
details.author: Wilma Rudolph

details.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow. Don't give up.
details.author: Robert Tew

details.quote: Strength comes from struggle. When you learn to see your struggles as opportunities to become stronger, better, wiser, then your thinking shifts from 'I can't do this' to 'I must do this.'
details.author: Toni Sorenson

details.quote: Sometimes, struggles are exactly what we need in our life. If we were to go through our life without any obstacles, we would be crippled. We would not be as strong as what we could have been. Give every opportunity a chance, leave no room for regrets.
details.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

details.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph. Self-realization demands very great struggle.
details.author: Swami Sivananda

details.quote: Struggle is the food from which change is made, and the best time to make the most of a struggle is when it's right in front of your face.
details.author: Danny Dreyer

details.quote: I disagree. I look at struggle as an opportunity to grow. True struggle happens when you can sense what is not working for you and you're willing to take the appropriate action to correct the situation. Those who accomplish change are willing to engage the struggle.
details.author: Danny Dreyer

details.quote: Unfortunately this earth is not. a fairy-land, but a struggle for life, perfectly natural and therefore extremely harsh.
details.author: Martin Bormann

details.quote: We all struggle with something, and need help. Whatever it is that you can't conquer on your own, I encourage you to give it to the Lord; He can fix anything! Your struggle is no more because VICTORY has taken it's place!! Have a VICTORIOUS day!
details.author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

details.quote: The way I see things, the way I see life, I see it as a struggle. And there's a great deal of reward I have gained coming to that understanding -- that existence is a struggle.
details.author: Harvey Keitel

details.quote: To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals - this alone is worth the struggle.
details.author: William Penn

details.quote: In order to appreciate your successes you must first appreciate your struggles.
details.author: Nishan Panwar

details.quote: In the heart of every struggle lies an opportunity to grow.
details.author: Melanie M. Koulouris

details.quote: The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.
details.author: Neale Donald Walsch

details.quote: Confidence comes from victory, but strength comes from the struggle.
details.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

details.quote: The difficulties and struggles of today are but the price we must pay for the accomplishments and victories of tomorrow.
details.author: William Boetcker

details.quote: The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
details.author: Charles de Leusse

details.quote: I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
details.author: Leo Christopher

details.quote: You are the last thought in my mind before I drift off to sleep and the first thought when I wake up each morning.
You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
details.author: Julia Roberts

details.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
details.author: James Baldwin

details.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
details.author: Lucille Ball

details.quote: I went to sleep last night with a smile because I knew I’d be dreaming of you… but I woke up this morning with a smile because you weren’t a dream.
I love you and that’s the beginning and end of everything.
details.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

details.quote: You are the source of my joy, the center of my world and the whole of my heart.
Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
details.author: Lord Byron

details.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
details.author: George Sand

details.quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
details.author: Lao Tzu

details.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever.
details.author: Alfred Tennyson

details.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
details.author: Helen Keller

details.quote: You know you’re in love when you don’t want to fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
details.author: Dr. Seuss

details.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
details.author: Paulo Coelho

details.quote: Immature love says: ‘I love you because I need you.' Mature love says ‘I need you because I love you.'
details.author: Erich Fromm

details.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
details.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

details.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
details.author: Robert A. Heinlein

details.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
details.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

details.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
details.author: Sarah Dessen

details.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
details.author: William Shakespeare

details.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
details.author: Jodi Picoult

details.quote: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
details.author: Jane Austen

details.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.
details.author: Anais Nin

details.quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
details.author: Jess C. Scott

details.quote: I think the perfection of love is that it's not perfect.
details.author: Taylor Swift

details.quote: Some love stories aren't epic novels. Some are short stories. But that doesn't make them any less filled with love.
details.author: Carrie Bradshaw
